title: MacBook 13" 2017 820-00840-A Wateer Damage
message:
Hello,  
I  have received  a MacBook 2017 820-00840-A  it is not powering on due  to water damage. where should I start diagnosing from ? when I  plug the power in should I get power readings or i have to jump start it to get  readings ? if i need to jump start what pins i need to jump start ?

Thannks

title: MacBook 13" 2017 820-00840-A Wateer Damage
message: Where is the liquid damage? PPBUS_G3H present?

title: MacBook 13" 2017 820-00840-A Wateer Damage
message: U have checks U5420 Pin 4 and 3 for PPBUS_G3H there is no power reading there do i have to jump the system to get power?

title: MacBook 13" 2017 820-00840-A Wateer Damage
message: U8400 Is where most of the corruption is LP8548B1SQ_-04

title: MacBook 13" 2017 820-00840-A Wateer Damage
message:
U8400 is backlight IC, so nothing to worry about until PPBUS is back. 

Voltage on F7000 and R7020?

title: MacBook 13" 2017 820-00840-A Wateer Damage
message:
F7000 Has no Voltage
R7020 broke off when i touched it, what board uses the same R i can remove from to reuse ? :) 
Pin 2 on R7020 is 5.25V

title: MacBook 13" 2017 820-00840-A Wateer Damage
message: Only the newer board use those type of resistors, so from 00045 and newer. Get some donor boards 00244, 00875 or something.

title: MacBook 13" 2017 820-00840-A Wateer Damage
message: i was referring to the cap :) i have seen these they will take forever to come

title: MacBook 13" 2017 820-00840-A Wateer Damage
message: Just get some boards, I'm pretty sure you will need more parts from them.

title: MacBook 13" 2017 820-00840-A Wateer Damage
message: Jut got some Boards Replaced R7020 still  there is no power on F7000  R7020 pin 2 has 5.25V. i think the PPBUS_G3H is not coming in. any comments ?

title: MacBook 13" 2017 820-00840-A Wateer Damage
message:
You think PPBUS is not coming on? Why not measure it?

Where was the original corrosion? Any around the CD3215 chips?

title: MacBook 13" 2017 820-00840-A Wateer Damage
message:
Duke; 
here are some  readings 
PPDCIN_G3H  @R9920  Pin 2 has  5.3  volt
C6482  HAS ZERO VOLT
PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3H   0.2 VOLT
R7075 HAS 0V

HOPE THIS HELPS IDENTIFY  THE ISSUE
